Reviews.Title: “Good value for budget motel”
Reviews.Author: Spoonette
Reviews.Content: traveled teenagers visit university illinois college hunting tour staying red roof able book upscale hotel clean functioned properly staff pleasant friendly hot coffee morning time employee recommend motel youre looking basic accommodations

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for everything Nancy & Nicole!”
Reviews.Author: Michele S
Reviews.Content: im business travler recently job champaign il 8 weeks unable affordable accomodations extended stay facility booked red roof inn offered affordable alternative stove issue seasoned business travler comfortable clean majority stay staff attentive clean towels rubbish removal day hotel maintained oh close resturant

Reviews.Title: “Clean enough budget hotel, some safety concerns”
Reviews.Author: Steph H
Reviews.Content: hotel clean wasnt condition price youd expect tv fine shower sink bed clean day night hotel relatively quiet heating unit functioned wasnt loud major issue hotel lost key front desk front desk clerk issued key told seen desk clerk name form id bit disconcerting im guessing walk key depending front desk

Reviews.Title: “Avoid RRI Champaign, stay at one of many other local hotels!”
Reviews.Author: KCLJ520
Reviews.Content: wife return relatives friends football game season stay champaign arrived 4 pm fine experience woman desk found broken glass corridor outside dog stepped fortunately hurting desk assured care 930 pm glass check 9 am morning carpet floor wallpaper bathroom filthy hole bedspread walls thin champaign football weekends noisy anyway figured hotels fault money 105 night stayed nicer hotel

Reviews.Title: “Terrible....”
Reviews.Author: beastie3
Reviews.Content: booked absolutely worse motel stayed rate paid motel advertising property 12 rate paid reservation service carpets stained furniture damaged sink caulk missing mildewed lint build shower exhaust fan month worth accumulation contacted management reservation service requesting discounted credit rate paid neither ownership provide resolution poor quality motel recommend stay red roof inn

Reviews.Title: “GREAT MANG AND FRONT DESK”
Reviews.Author: farmergal38
Reviews.Content: front desk people location dont stayed red roofs nice helpful deserve alot running fix thats fault location sad investment

HotelInfo.Name: Red Roof Inn
